trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which the system arranges minimized windows.
This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
Arranged vertically, from top to bottom.

Valid with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
Arranged horizontally, from left to right.

Valid with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
Arranged horizontally, from right to left.

Valid with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
Arranged vertically, from bottom to top.

Valid with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
